Q75.description: Opinion on whether government information should be for official use only
Q75.question: Should information held by public authorities only be used by government officials and not shared with the public?

Q76A.description: Opinion on making local government budgets public
Q76A.question: Should budgets and expenditures for the local government council be made public?

values.0: No, this information should only be for government use
values.1: Yes, this information should be available to the public

Q76B.description: Opinion on making local government bids and contracts public
Q76B.question: Should all bids and contracts for government-funded projects be made public?

values.0: No, this information should only be for government use
values.1: Yes, this information should be available to the public

Q76C.description: Opinion on making salaries of government officials and teachers public
Q76C.question: Should salary information for teachers and local government officials be made public?

values.0: No, this information should only be for government use
values.1: Yes, this information should be available to the public
